# SPS Daily — Science, Philosophy & Society

> A curated digest of the best writing on science, philosophy, and society.

## About
SPS Daily is a daily editorial digest inspired by Arts & Letters Daily. It curates long-form articles from quality sources across five categories: Science, Philosophy, Society, Books, and Essays. Articles are selected based on depth and quality — word count, source reputation, and editorial judgment — not trending topics or clickbait.

## Motto
Ekam Sat — Truth is One.

## URL
https://spsdaily.thebeakers.com

## Content
- Science: Articles from Quanta Magazine, Nautilus, Nature, Science, New Scientist, Undark, and others
- Philosophy: Articles from Aeon, Notre Dame Philosophical Reviews, Daily Nous, 3 Quarks Daily, Hedgehog Review, and others
- Society: Articles from Noema, The Atlantic, The New Yorker, Foreign Affairs, New Statesman, and others
- Books: Reviews from New York Review of Books, London Review of Books, TLS, LA Review of Books, and others
- Essays: Long-form from Granta, Paris Review, Guernica, Electric Literature, and others
